# paulkuo.tw — LLMs-full.txt
# Extended version with article inventory for RAG systems

> Paul Kuo（郭曜郎）的個人網站。在技術與文明的交匯處，重建秩序、循環再利用、守護人性尊嚴。

## Author Entity

- Name: Paul Kuo (郭曜郎)
- Role: Commercial Integration & AI Digital Development Director at SDTI (佳龍科技)
- Expertise: Circular Economy, AI Systems, Semiconductor Cooperation (Taiwan-Japan), Theology
- Location: Taiwan
- Website: https://paulkuo.tw
- Contact: paul@lasaas.com

## Structured Data

All pages include JSON-LD structured data:
- Home: Person + WebSite schema graph
- Articles: BlogPosting with author reference, datePublished, dateModified, articleSection, inLanguage
- Breadcrumb navigation on all article pages

## Crawling Notes

- Static HTML (no JavaScript required for content extraction)
- All article content is inside `<article>` tags with `<div class="article-body">` wrapper
- Sidebar/navigation clearly separated with `<nav>`, `<aside>`, `<footer>` tags
- Sitemap available at /sitemap-index.xml
- RSS feed available at /rss.xml
